title: Do stones and crystals really possess energy?
description: Answer (1 of 9): Not in the way I think you mean. The problem with pseudosciences like crystal healing is that they steal concepts from the sciences like "energy" and redefine them in some manner whereby they no longer make any sense. Energy, in physics, is the potential for doing work. Work is...
